metadata.title: CVE-2024-1329 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise 1.5.13 up to 1.6.6, and 1.7.3 templaterenderer is vulnerable to arbitrary file write on the host as the Nomadclient user through symlink attacks. Fixed in Nomad 1.7.4, 1.6.7, 1.5.14.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
